Text.desc: These are useful job contacts from various companies.

Contacts.Name: Ren Yonker
Contacts.Details: This is the guy who contacted me when I was in the interview process for nCino.

Contacts.Name: Dan Wuensch
Contacts.Details: This guy told someone on LinkedIn to DM him about a SWE job opportunity at nCino.

Contacts.Name: Pianpian Xu Guthrie
Contacts.Details: Amotions, Inc. is a small startup I interned at. Contact me and I'll write you a letter of recommendation and send her your resume.

Contacts.Name: Iesha James
Contacts.Details: This woman contacted me about interviewing for a full-time SWE position in RTP.

Contacts.Name: Kevin Parker
Contacts.Details: Corning Incorporated is in Wilmington. I talked to this guy at the UNCW computing showcase. Nice guy.

Contacts.Name: Natalie Abraham
Contacts.Details: This women works at a recruiting agency called "PeopleSERVE, Inc." but contacted me about a SWE job at Fidelity Investments on linkedin in RTP. Her phone number is 857-355-0413.

Contacts.Name: Nathiraa E.
Contacts.Details: This women messaged me on LinkedIn, she was recruiting in Raleigh, North Carolina and Richardson, Texas. Her phone number is 469-672-3321.

Contacts.Name: Jasmine Gomes
Contacts.Details: This women messaged me on LinkedIn about Software Engineering roles in Charlotte and Mooresville. Note that it's MoorEsville, not MorrIsville which is in RTP.

Contacts.Name: Lauren F.
Contacts.Details: Jasmine Gomes told me she would send my resume to this lady. You can DM her directly on LinkedIn without connecting with her.

Contacts.Name: Alex Rosso
Contacts.Details: This was my recruiter when I was interviewing with Lenovo for a full-time SWE position.

Contacts.Name: Jane Shepard
Contacts.Details: This women is a recruiter at Lenovo and went to UNCW

Contacts.Name: Davis Bryson
Contacts.Details: The UNCW computer science department has sent emails about Ohanafy SWE job openings with this guys email in them.
This is the general recruiting email for Ohanafy.

Contacts.Name: Jay Parker
Contacts.Details: This guy is the CTO at Union County Public Schools. Gi Iyer contacted me on Handshake and gave me his info.

Contacts.Name: Brian Davis
Contacts.Details: This guy runs CIT jobs at Union County Public Schools. Gi Iyer contacted me on Handshake and gave me his info.

Contacts.Name: Girija Iyer
Contacts.Details: Gi Iyer contacted me on Handshake about jobs at Union County Public Schools and a UCPS Career fair at Weddington High School.

Contacts.Name: Pirelli Pandac
Contacts.Details: This guy contacted me on LinkedIn about a Devops Engineer position at Gilero in Durham, North Carolina.
This is who you contact if you're interested in the UNCW TAC Student Worker Technician.

Contacts.Name: Clarisse Cortez
Contacts.Details: This was the recruiter that contacted me about my Pearson SWE internship interview.

Contacts.Name: Adam Twitchell
Contacts.Details: This connector DM'd me on Linkedin about a remote startup position in SF, California. He said he works under an NDA so he can't say the name of the company, but that it is a paid full-time SWE position. "GreenLyte Group" is the name of the IT Recruiting firm, not the actual company. He said the position involved building backend Rest APIs.

Contacts.Name: Brandon Bernal
Contacts.Details: The UNCW computer science department sent an email about this guy recruiting for SWE positions in Cary, NC.

Contacts.Name: Glenn Hasteadt
Contacts.Details: The UNCW computer science department sent out an email about jobs at this place.

Contacts.Name: Sharyne Miller
Contacts.Role: Associate Vice Chancellor of Technology and CIO
Contacts.Details: This women sends out job opportunity emails to the UNCW comp sci mailing list.

Contacts.Name: Jamie Cooper
Contacts.Details: I was also contacted by the number 770-977-2127. They were both automated, so just messaging them might get a response.

Contacts.Name: Caleb Barnwell
Contacts.Details: This guy contacted me about a SWE internship in Fall 2022.

Contacts.Name: Sara Gibson
Contacts.Details: This women contacted me about a SWE internship in Fall 2022.

Contacts.Name: Kevin Norton
Contacts.Company: Mission Technologies, a division of HII
Contacts.Details: This guy contacted me about a SWE internship in Fall 2022.

Contacts.Name: Andy Herrmann
Contacts.Details: The UNCW Comp Sci department sent out an email about a DOS recruiting event with this name and email.

Contacts.Name: Erika Marsek
Contacts.Details: This women contacted me about a W2 role in Charlotte. It seemed like they wanted someone with more experience though.

Contacts.Name: Person #1
Contacts.Details: He's my friend's dad. HMU if interested.

Contacts.Name: Person #2
Contacts.Details: This was my old manager at USAA, hmu if interested.

Contacts.Name: Person #3
Contacts.Role: Senior Manager XaaS Development and IT
Contacts.Details: I personally know this hiring manager at Lenovo. He might be able to write you a letter or recommendation/talk to you about jobs. Note that unfortunately his word might not mean that much.

Contacts.Name: Multiple People
Contacts.Details: I know various connections at IBM, hmu if interested.

Contacts.Name: Gianna Sheffield
Contacts.Details: This women briefly went to UNCW and is a SWE manager at Amazon. She accepted my LinkedIn connect request, so if you wanted to message her, that might be a good way to do it.

Contacts.Name: Kevin Hostler
Contacts.Details: This guy went to UNCW and now he works as a SWE manager at Microsoft. He accepted my LinkedIn connect request, so if you wanted to message him, that might be a good way to do it.

Contacts.Name: Paul Dakessian
Contacts.Details: This guy works as a SWE manager at Microsoft. He accepted my LinkedIn connect request, so if you wanted to message him, that might be a good way to do it.

Contacts.Name: Kevin Kanhai
Contacts.Details: This guy contacted me on LinkedIn about a SWE opportunity.

Contacts.Name: Liz Flowers
Contacts.Details: The UNCW computer science department sent an email about this women recruiting in Wilmington.

Contacts.Name: Phoebe Roberts
Contacts.Details: This women messaged me on LinkedIn about a remote Swift iOS Developer position.

Contacts.Name: Neal Shulman
Contacts.Details: Dr. Pence sent out an email that this guy was looking for someone to work on his website, social media campaign, etc.

Contacts.Name: Jennifer Lawrence
Contacts.Details: This women contacted me on LinkedIn about an Entry level SWE position on LinkedIn.

Contacts.Name: Ravi Chauhan
Contacts.Details: This recruiter contacted me on LinkedIn about this position, which is supposedly in Durham, NC. His number is 408-762-6686.

Contacts.Name: John Richardson
Contacts.Details: I'm not sure if that's actually his LinkedIn. The UNCW computer science department sent an email about this guy recruiting for SWE positions.

Contacts.Name: Crystal Chapman
Contacts.Details: The UNCW computer science department sent an email about this women recruiting for SWE positions at UNCW.

Contacts.Name: Weston Lawrence
Contacts.Details: This was the guy who recruited and interviewed me for the tutoring position.

Contacts.Name: Meg Kuecker
Contacts.Details: This woman contacted me on HandShake about a tutoring opportunity.

Contacts.Name: Daniel Ramos
Contacts.Details: This guy contacted me on Handshake about a full-time jr SWE position.

Contacts.Name: Mallory Norris
Contacts.Details: This was my recruiter for a SWE internship in Kansas City.
In their job postings on LinkedIn, they say you can send them the job title and requisition of the role you're interested in. Use this email to send them your info.

Contacts.Name: Thomas LaRocco
Contacts.Details: I talked to this guy briefly about a mobile development job in Wilmington.

Contacts.Name: Patrick Groetzinger
Contacts.Details: This guy messaged me on LinkedIn about a full-time Applications Engineer position in Raleigh, NC.

Contacts.Name: Sydney Underwood
Contacts.Details: This women briefly contacted me about a SWE job at R.E. Mason in RTP.

Contacts.Name: Sathivada Sitaram
Contacts.Details: This person contacted me via email about a contract SWE job. Another person you could contact is "Malla Priyanka" her email is priyanka.malla@cerebra-consulting.com.

Contacts.Name: Ryan Hinterleiter
Contacts.Details: I'm aware the email is a phone number. This guy contacted me via LinkedIn/phone about a contract SWE job at Ally Financial, but it seemed like it would start at Brooksource. I unfortunately never got his email.

Contacts.Name: Mikey Barker
Contacts.Details: This guy called me regarding a SWE role in Charlotte.

Contacts.Name: Tushar Maity
Contacts.Details: This person contacted me about an opportunity via email.

Contacts.Name: Dale Cohen
Contacts.Company: Cohen Cognition and Perception Lab at UNCW
Contacts.Details: My groups CSC 450 project was made for Dr. Cohen. I'm not sure if he does comp-sci projects outside of CSC 450 though.

Contacts.Name: Ying Wang
Contacts.Details: Could also contact him directly at wangyy@uncw.edu. I've seen SWE positions here.

Contacts.Name: Morgan O'Connell
Contacts.Role: MarineQuest Volunteer Coordinator and Program Assistant
Contacts.Details: This seems to be a summer program in Wilmington. Contact her via email. It's not a SWE job, but it seems like it might be a good summer job.

Contacts.Name: Greg Olsen
Contacts.Details: This guy contacted me via email about a Junior Research Engineer position.

Contacts.Name: Jill McGovern
Contacts.Details: This woman made a post on LinkedIn saying that she'd start recruiting for full-time positions on August 1st.

Contacts.Name: Michael Quigley
Contacts.Details: This guy is an engineering manager at Red Ventures and went to UNCW.

Contacts.Name: Victor Hahn
Contacts.Details: This guy is an engineering manager at Red Ventures and posts about open roles.

When I applied to a job at Red Ventures, this was the email I got a response from. It just asked me questions about my experience and they never got back to me. Red Ventures is in Charlotte and my older sister works there.
I know that's not linkedIn, but thats a good way to contact them
I know that's not linkedIn, but thats a good way to contact them
This company feels "scammy". I wouldn't really recommend working for them.
